Key Match Events: Daniel Muñoz scored in the 32nd minute
Jefferson Lerma scored in the 42nd minute
Julio Enciso scored for Paraguay in the 69th minute
VAR overruled a potential penalty in the 84th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Alejandro Moreno says Colombia will be happy after the win
James Rodríguez said the team could have done better in the second half
Luis Díaz expressed confidence in the team's performance and future
Paraguay struggled to create scoring opportunities in the second half
Miscellaneous Highlights: Colombia extended their unbeaten run to 24 matches
Colombia's last defeat was a 1-0 loss to Argentina in February 2022
The match took place at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas
The game was covered by FS1
